ðŸ“– Summary: The Cloudflare Vibe SDK is an open-source platform for building AI-powered web application generators. It allows users to define application requirements in natural language, which are then translated into functional applications deployed on the Cloudflare platform, making it suitable for companies building AI-powered platforms, internal development, and SaaS platforms.
